sentences.english: The bulk of our nutritional needs come from fruits, vegetables, and grains.
sentences.chinese: 我們所需的營養大部分都來自於水果，蔬菜和穀物。

sentences.english: Among grains, only rice is consumed in great quantities than wheat. (Todd Korol/Reuters)
sentences.chinese: 在所有穀物裏，僅有大米的消耗量比小麥多。

sentences.english: In China, many farmers grain the pigs.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，好多農民都是用穀物餵豬。

sentences.english: Some gardeners plant potatoes under straw, or stems of dried grain.
sentences.chinese: 一些園藝家在稿杆或曬乾了的穀物莖杆下中土豆。
穀物和麪粉都是種類物。

sentences.english: When grains are refined, the bran and the germ are removed.
sentences.chinese: 加工過的穀物把麩皮和胚芽去除了。

sentences.english: Corn shot up to seventy-three cents a bushel.
sentences.chinese: 穀物猛漲到一蒲式耳七十三美分。

sentences.english: Last year's cereal harvest in Niger was 26 percent below the previous year.
sentences.chinese: 去年，尼日爾穀物產量比前一年偏低26%。

sentences.english: We are trading with the leading grain suppler in North America.
sentences.chinese: 我們與北美最大的穀物供應商進行貿易。

sentences.english: Your diabetes diet probably includes plenty of fruits, vegetables and whole grains.
sentences.chinese: 你的糖尿病食療很可能包括大量水果，蔬菜和全穀物。

sentences.english: The main content of cereal and potato is starch.
sentences.chinese: 穀物及薯類的主要成份是澱粉。

sentences.english: Grains form the lowest level and the foundation of the pyramid.
sentences.chinese: 穀物是這個裏面的最低層和金字塔的基礎。

sentences.english: These grains may parch , but they will not pop.
sentences.chinese: 這些穀物能夠烤，但他們不能爆。

sentences.english: Small batch vodka alembic distilled from local grain and the spring water.
sentences.chinese: 這種限量伏特加採用當地的穀物和泉水釀造。

sentences.english: Most pediatricians recommend starting with an iron-fortified cereal.
sentences.chinese: 大多數兒科醫生建議給寶寶餵養含鐵的穀物。

definition: five crops, e.g. millet 粟[su4], soybean 豆[dou4], sesame 麻[ma2], barley 麥|麦[mai4], rice 稻[dao4] or other variants/all crops/all grains/oats, peas, beans and barley
grain crops other than rice and wheat
to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
